name: Explosif's Polychromatic Pillows
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Visible Light Remodulation Device drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Visible Light Remodulation Device" "257964" #L "Concrete Cushion" "125456" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Visible Light Remodulation Device + Concrete Cushion = #L "Explosif's Polychromatic Pillows" "258345" Note: right clicking the pillow will change the modifications on it
